utils.environment package

Submodules

utils.environment.env_wrappers module

Environment wrappers for the rectangular and square environments.

class utils.environment.env_wrappers.FlatteningActionMaskObservationWrapperRect(env)

Bases: gym.core.ObservationWrapper

A Gym environment observation wrapper for the rectangular environment.

This wrapper flattens the action mask in the observation space.

observation_space

The observation space.

Type

gym.spaces.Dict

observation(observation)

Overrides the default method of the superclass to flatten the “action_mask” space in the observation dictionary.

Parameters

observation (dict) – The original observation dictionary.

Returns

The modified observation dictionary with the “action_mask” space

flattened.

Return type

dict

class utils.environment.env_wrappers.FlatteningActionWrapperRect(env)

Bases: gym.core.ActionWrapper

A Gym environment action wrapper for the rectangular environment.

Action wrapper which flattens a tuple of discrete actions into a single discrete action for the rectangular environment.

factor_sizes

The list of the sizes of the discrete action spaces.

Type

list

action_space

The discrete action space.

Type

gym.spaces.Discrete

action(action)

Overrides the default method of the superclass to translate a discrete action into a tuple of discrete actions.

Parameters

action (int) – The discrete action.

Returns

A list of discrete actions.

Return type

list

validate_action(action)

Overrides the default method of the superclass to validate the action.

Parameters

action (int) – The action to be validated.

Returns

True if the action is valid, False otherwise.

Return type

bool
